definitions.body: PS:2835; ‖ form of [[יעף]] q.v.; occurrences dub.);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 fs. [[עָֽיְפָה נַפְשִׁי לְ]] Je 4:31 (? rd. [[עֲיֵפָה]]); Impf. 3 ms. [[וַיׇּ֫עַף]] Ju Jdg 4:21 (< [[וְיׇעֵף]] GFM Bu), 1Sa 14:28 (del. We Bu Kit Löhr, emend. HPS), v:1Sa 14:31 (rd. [[וַיִּעַף]] [√ [[יעף]]] Buhl HPS), 2Sa 21:15 (corrupt, HPS; for Philist. Name We Dr Bu Kit).
